com.mesosphere.sdk.config

Interface ConfigTargetStore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigStore<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfigStore

    public interface ConfigTargetStore
    This interface defines the subset of ConfigStore operations which are applicable to setting and retrieving the UUID of the current target configuration. This interface is broken out from ConfigStore to allow users to ignore the the generic typing of the config objects themselves.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.UUID getTargetConfig()
      Returns the current ID of the active target configuration, or throws an exception if none is set.
      void setTargetConfig(java.util.UUID id)
      Stores the ID of the active target configuration, replacing any current value.

    • Method Detail

      • setTargetConfig

        void setTargetConfig(java.util.UUID id)
              throws ConfigStoreException
        Stores the ID of the active target configuration, replacing any current value.
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException - if writing the ID fails
        See Also:
        getTargetConfig()

      • getTargetConfig

        java.util.UUID getTargetConfig()
                        throws ConfigStoreException
        Returns the current ID of the active target configuration, or throws an exception if none is set.
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException - if reading or deserializing the ID fails, or no value is set
        See Also:
        setTargetConfig(UUID)
